resources.string: Firstly fill the form below, please

This app is designed to monitor users mind activity and analyse their ability to distinguish pictures.\nOn results of passed test we can grade patienceâ€™s mind activity and decide does it need extra treatment or not

Firstly you should pass a survey that contains such questions 
1) What is your sex? 
2) What is your age? 
Secondary you should determine that contents of the images are the same. 
Thank you for your attention!
